title: Maryland
summary: Maryland (US: /ˈmɛrələnd/ (listen) MERR-ə-lənd)[lower-alpha 1] is a state in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States,[10][11] bordering Virginia, West Virginia, and the District of Columbia to its south and west; Pennsylvania to its north; and Delaware and the Atlantic Ocean to its east. Baltimore[12] is the largest city in the state, and the capital is Annapolis. Among its occasional nicknames are Old Line State, the Free State, and the Chesapeake Bay State. It is named after the English Queen Henrietta Maria, known in England as Queen Mary, who was the wife of King Charles I.[13][14]
